recipe-app.title: 🍲 Recipe Application
recipe-app.description: A clean, cross-platform recipe app designed for food lovers. Users can explore, post, and review recipes with vibrant images. Built with Flutter for smooth mobile experience and Spring Boot for secure, scalable backend operations.
features: 🔐 Auth system with hashed passwords & JWT
📸 Upload and preview recipe photos
🧑‍🍳 View detailed recipes with instructions
💬 Add reviews and read community feedback
📱 Mobile-optimized responsive layout
💾 Save your favorite recipes for easy access later
📊 Display nutritional facts for each recipe, including calories, proteins, fats, etc

invoice-tracker-system.title: 🏪 Supermarket Invoice Tracker System
invoice-tracker-system.description: A clean, cross-platform recipe app designed for food lovers. Users can explore, post, and review recipes with vibrant images. Built with Flutter for smooth mobile experience and Spring Boot for secure, scalable backend operations.
features: 👥 Customer management with invoice history
📦 Item management with live stock tracking
🧾 Create and manage invoices with selected items
📉 Auto-update inventory when items are purchased
📁 Category management for better item organization
🚚 Supplier management and restocking system
🔍 Search and filter items, customers, or invoices

retrodiner.title: 🍔 RetroDiner Website
retrodiner.description: RetroDiner is a stylish and fully functional restaurant website that brings the nostalgic diner experience online. Users can browse the menu, place orders, make table reservations, and leave feedback — all from a clean and responsive interface. The site is powered by PHP and MySQLi for dynamic content and data handling.
tech: MySQLi (Database integration for orders, feedback, reservations)
features: 📜 Interactive digital menu with categories and pricing
🛒 Order system to select and place food orders
📅 Online table reservation with date/time selection
💬 Feedback form for customer reviews and suggestions
ℹ️ About page with diner history and team info
📱 Fully responsive design for mobile and tablet users

digital-ordering-system.title: 🧾 Digital Ordering System
digital-ordering-system.description: An efficient and user-friendly digital ordering system built for restaurants and cafes. Customers can browse the menu, place orders, and track their order status in real time. The system enhances in-house service by replacing paper menus and manual ordering with a sleek digital interface.
features: 📱 Interactive digital menu with photos and descriptions
🛒 Add-to-cart and real-time order submission
👤 Login and authentication for personalized experience
🧑‍🍳 Kitchen view for order preparation tracking
